mapper.insert: insert into user( name, phone, addr, comment, wxId,xiaoqu,createTime,birthday,jf,jfDate) values (#{user.name}, #{user.phone}, #{user.addr}, #{user.comment}, #{user.wxId}, #{user.xiaoqu},#{user.createTime},#{user.birthday},#{user.jf},#{user.jfDate})
mapper.select: select id,name, phone, addr, comment, wxId, xiaoqu,auth,createTime from user where wxId = #{wxId} and auth = 'admin'

select xiaoqu,count(id) allUserNum,count(case when name is not null then id else null end) namedUserNum,count(case when auth ="admin1" then id else null end) adminNum from user group by xiaoqu order by xiaoqu;
